column3: ## Launching off from Home Page
Ensure you are not logged into the system
Ensure you have cleared your browser cookies (you could use an ingognito browser window)
Go to the DOAJ home page

column4: The DOAJ home page is displayed
The DOAJ Cookie banner is displayed

column3: Dismiss the Cookie Banner

column4: The Cookie banner disappears and does not reappear on subsequent pages

column3: Hover over Support

column4: The dropdown menu appears

column3: Move your mouse away from Support

column4: The dropdown menu disappears

column3: Click "Support" at the top

column4: You are taken to Support DOAJ page

column3: Go back to the home page
Repeat for the Apply menu
Hover over About

column4: The dropdown appears

column3: Move your mouse away from Apply

column4: The dropdown menu disappears

column3: Click "About" at the top

column4: The About menu appears and stays open

column3: Click "About" at the top

column4: The menu disappears

column3: Repeat for Search and Documentation menus
Click the orange magnifying glass, top right

column4: The Quick search box appears over the homepage

column3: Click it again.

column4: The Quick search box disappears

column3: Click Login

column4: You are taken to the Login page: https://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/account/login

column3: Click the DOAJ logo top left

column4: You are taken to the homepage

column3: Look at the statistics under the Search box

column4: The statistics show the numbers that you would expect to see
You can click on any of the figures and be taken to the correct list of search results

column3: Click back on the browser

column4: The number of countries is not clickable

column3: Scroll down and click 'Why index your journal in DOAJ'

column4: You are taken to https://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/apply/why-index/

column3: Click back on your browser and click 'How to apply'

column4: You are taken to https://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/apply/guide/

column3: Click back on your browser and hover over the APPLY NOW button

column4: It changes colour and moves

column3: Click the button

column4: You are taken to https://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/account/login?redirected=apply

column3: Click back on your browser and hover over the SUPPORT DOAJ button

column4: It changes colour and moves

column3: Click the button

column4: You are taken to https://testdoaj.cottagelabs.com/support/

column3: Scroll to 'From the blog'

column4: There are 3 blog posts displayed

column3: Click on the title of a blog post

column4: You are taken to the appropriate post on the DOAJ blog site. Opens in a new tab.

column3: Close the tab.
Click on "More" after a blog post

column4: You are taken to the appropriate post on the DOAJ blog site. Opens in a new tab.

column3: Close the tab.
On the right, click on 'Tweets by @doajplus'

column4: You are taken to the DOAJ Twitter profile. Opens in a new tab.

column3: Close the tab.
Click on one of the Tweets

column4: You are taken to the tweet, on Twitter, and opens in a new tab.

column3: Close the tab.
Hover over the list of tweets and scroll

column4: You can scroll through 20 tweets

column3: Scroll to the bottom and click 'Load more tweets'

column4: Another 20 tweets are loaded. You can scroll up and down the list of tweets without the main scroll for the page being affected.

column3: Click on each link in the footer, coming back to the home page afterwards if necessary

column4: Each link takes you to the appropriate page

column3: Go back to the home page
Scroll to the very bottom of the page

column4: The copyright notification on the bottom right is for the current year

column3: Click on each link.

column4: Each link takes you to the appropriate page

column3: Scroll lto the bottom of the home page. Click the orange up arrow in the bottom right-hand corner.

column4: You are returned to the top of the home page
